title: Goldman Sees China Spat Weighing on Japan’s GDP Via Tourism Hit
description:
Rising tensions with China may shave about 0.2 percentage point off Japan’s gross domestic product growth if tourism and the export of consumer goods to the world’s second-largest economy decline, according to economists at Goldman Sachs Group Inc.

The analysts base their calculations on the fallou...

title: Black Friday kicks off as inflation-burned shoppers scour for deals
description: PLANO, Texas — Black Friday is well underway, with retailers splashing their websites and storefronts with markdowns meant as a reprieve for inflation-fatigued customers who are looking to save on things like pantry and toiletry staples, jackets, makeup and gaming consoles. title: Influence of Trade Policy on Maritime Shipping Dynamics
